sqlMap.select: SELECT CEIL(SUM(CNT) / #PAGE_PER_CNT#) AS PAGE FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM SCON602 WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV = '3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM SCON743 WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV = '3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 )

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM SCON602 WHERE SEQ > #SEQ# AND EPAY_NO = #EPAY_NO# AND DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') AND TRN_YN = '0' AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV = '3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM SCON743 WHERE SEQ > #SEQ# AND EPAY_NO = #EPAY_NO# AND DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') AND TRN_YN = '0' AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV = '3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TBL_CD AS TBL_CD /* 연계테이블 코드 */ , SEQ AS SEQ /* 일련번호 */ , NVL(SIDO_COD,' ') AS SIDO_COD /* 시도코드(2) */ , NVL(TAX_ITEM,' ') AS TAX_ITEM /* 과목코드(3) */ , NVL(TAX_YY,' ') AS TAX_YY /* 과세년도(4) */ , NVL(SGG_COD,' ') AS SGG_COD /* 구청코드(3) */ , NVL(ADONG_COD,' ') AS HACD /* 과세동코드(3) */ , NVL(TAX_SNO,' ') AS TAX_SNO /* 과세번호(6) */ , NVL(TAX_DIV, ' ') AS TAX_DIV /* 과세구분(1) */ , NVL(TAX_MM, ' ') AS TAX_MM /* 과세월(2) */ , NVL(ACCT_COD, ' ') AS ACCT_COD /* 회계코드(2) */ , NVL(REPLACE(REG_NO,' ',''), ' ') AS REG_NO /* 실명번호(3) */ , NVL(REPLACE(REG_NO_WT,' ',''), ' ') AS REG_NO_WT /* 위탁자실명번호(13) */ , NVL(SUBSTR(REPLACE(REG_NM,'''',''),1,200), ' ') AS REG_NM /* 실명(200) */ , NVL(REPLACE(TAX_GDS,'''',' '), ' ') AS MLGN /* 과세대상(60) */ , NVL(POST, ' ') AS ZIP_CD /* 발송지우편번호 */ , NVL(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ADDRESS,'''',' '),CHR(13),''),CHR(10),''),' ') AS ADDRESS /* 주소 */ , NVL(TAX_STD, 0) AS TAX_STD /* 과세표준액 */ , NVL(DECODE(MNTX_ADTX,0,MNTX,MNTX-MNTX_ADTX),0) AS MNTX /* 본세 */ , NVL(MNTX_ADTX,0) AS MNTX_ADTX /* 본세가산금 */ , NVL(DECODE(CPTX_ADTX,0,CPTX,CPTX-CPTX_ADTX),0) AS CPTX /* 도시셰획세 */ , NVL(CPTX_ADTX,0) AS CPTX_ADTX /* 도시계획세가산금 */ , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(TAX_ITEM,1,3) NOT IN('101','102','111') THEN DECODE(CFTX_ADTX,0,CFTX_ASTX,CFTX_ASTX-CFTX_ADTX) ELSE 0 END AS CFTX /* 공동시설세 */ , NVL(CFTX_ADTX,0) AS CFTX_ADTX /* 공동시설세가산금 */ , NVL(DECODE(LETX_ADTX,0,LETX,LETX-LETX_ADTX),0) AS LETX /* 교육세 */ , NVL(LETX_ADTX,0) AS LETX_ADTX /* 교육세가산금 */ , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(TAX_ITEM,1,3) IN('101','102','111') THEN DECODE( ASTX_ADTX,0,CFTX_ASTX,CFTX_ASTX-ASTX_ADTX) ELSE 0 END AS ASTX /* 농특세 */ , NVL(ASTX_ADTX,0) AS ASTX_ADTX /* 농특세가산금 */ , NVL(CRE_DT,' ') AS TAX_DT /* 고지발생일 */ , NVL(DUE_DT,' ') AS DUE_DT /* 납기일 */ , NVL(SUBSTR(INSERT_DT,1,8),' ') AS INSERT_DT /* 입력시간 */ , NVL(TRIM(TAX_STD_DIS),'') AS TAX_STD_DIS /* 과세표준설명 */ , NVL(TRIM(TAX_STD_DIS2),'') AS TAX_STD_DIS2 /* 과세표준설명2 */ , NVL(SUM_B_AMT,0) AS SUM_B_AMT /* 납기내총금액 */ , NVL(SUM_F_AMT,0) AS SUM_F_AMT /* 납기후총금액 */ , NVL(GOJI_DIV,' ') AS GOJI_DIV /* 고지구분 */ , '2' AS TONG_DIV /* 통합구분(기본값:2) */ , NVL(CUD_OPT,' ') AS CUD_OPT /* 신규/변동구분 */ , NVL(TRIM(EPAY_NO),' ') AS EPAY_NO /* 전자납부번호 */ , NVL(RCP_CNT,0) AS RCP_CNT /* 분납횟수 */ , NVL(DLQ_DIV,0) AS DLQ_DIV /* 체납구분 미납:1,체납2 */ , NVL(TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD),' ') AS EPAY_NO_OLD /* 구전자납부번호 */ , NVL(AUTO_TRNF_YN, 'N') AS AUTO_TRNF_YN /* 자동이체여부 */ , NVL(GIROSGG_COD,' ') AS GIRO_SGG /* 발행기관분류코드 */ , NVL(GIRO_NO,' ') AS GIRO_NO /* 지로번호 */ , NVL(TAX_NO,' ') AS TAX_NO /* 납세번호 */ , NVL(DUE_F_DT,' ') AS GGYM /* 납기후일자 */ , NVL(DUE_DF_OPT,' ') AS NOTICE_CLS /* 납기후수납여부 */ , CASE WHEN CUD_OPT IN ('3') THEN 'Y' ELSE DECODE(SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT, 0, 'Y', 'N') END AS DEL_YN /* 신규/변동/삭제 구분 */ , SIDO_COD||SGG_COD||CHK1||ACCT_COD||TAX_ITEM||TAX_YY||TAX_MM||TAX_DIV||ADONG_COD||TO_CHAR(TAX_SNO,'FM099999') ||CHK2||TO_CHAR(SUM_B_AMT,'FM09999999999')||TO_CHAR(SUM_F_AMT,'FM09999999999')||CHK3 ||TO_CHAR(MNTX,'FM09999999999')||TO_CHAR(CPTX,'FM0999999999')||TO_CHAR(CFTX_ASTX,'FM0999999999') ||TO_CHAR(LETX,'FM09999999999')||DUE_DT ||CHK4||FILLER||GOJI_DIV||CHK5 AS OCR_BD , NVL(DLQ_CHG_DIV, ' ') AS DLQ_CHG_DIV /* 체납변경구분코드 */ , NVL(CAR_NO, ' ') , CEIL(ROWNUM / #PAGE_PER_CNT#) AS PAGE /* 페이지당 갯수 */ FROM ( SELECT TMP.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'SCON602' AS TBL_CD, A.* FROM SCON602 A WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') /* 처리상태 */ AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') /* 신규/변동/삭제 */ AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') /* 미체납/체납 */ AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# /* 전송처리코드 */ AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV='3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 UNION ALL SELECT 'SCON743' AS TBL_CD, B.* FROM SCON743 B WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') /* 처리상태 */ AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') /* 신규/변동/삭제 */ AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') /* 미체납/체납 */ AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# /* 전송처리코드 */ AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV='3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 ) ORDER BY TAX_DIV DESC, SEQ ASC ) TMP ORDER BY RNUM ) ) T1 WHERE T1.PAGE = #PAGE#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NVL(SIDO_COD,' ') AS SIDO_COD /* 시도코드(2) */ , NVL(TAX_ITEM,' ') AS TAX_ITEM /* 과목코드(3) */ , NVL(TAX_YY,' ') AS TAX_YY /* 과세년도(4) */ , NVL(SGG_COD,' ') AS SGG_COD /* 구청코드(3) */ , NVL(ADONG_COD,' ') AS HACD /* 과세동코드(3) */ , NVL(TAX_SNO,' ') AS TAX_SNO /* 과세번호(6) */ , NVL(TAX_DIV, ' ') AS TAX_DIV /* 과세구분(1) */ , NVL(TAX_MM, ' ') AS TAX_MM /* 과세월(2) */ , NVL(ACCT_COD, ' ') AS ACCT_COD /* 회계코드(2) */ , NVL(REPLACE(REG_NO,' ',''), ' ') AS REG_NO /* 실명번호(3) */ , NVL(REPLACE(REG_NO_WT,' ',''), ' ') AS REG_NO_WT /* 위탁자실명번호(13) */ , NVL(SUBSTR(REPLACE(REG_NM,'''',''),1,200), ' ') AS REG_NM /* 실명(200) */ , NVL(REPLACE(TAX_GDS,'''',' '), ' ') AS MLGN /* 과세대상(60) */ , NVL(POST, ' ') AS ZIP_CD /* 발송지우편번호 */ , NVL(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ADDRESS,'''',' '),CHR(13),''),CHR(10),''),' ') AS ADDRESS /* 주소 */ , NVL(TAX_STD, 0) AS TAX_STD /* 과세표준액 */ , NVL(DECODE(MNTX_ADTX,0,MNTX,MNTX-MNTX_ADTX),0) AS MNTX /* 본세 */ , NVL(MNTX_ADTX,0) AS MNTX_ADTX /* 본세가산금 */ , NVL(DECODE(CPTX_ADTX,0,CPTX,CPTX-CPTX_ADTX),0) AS CPTX /* 도시셰획세 */ , NVL(CPTX_ADTX,0) AS CPTX_ADTX /* 도시계획세가산금 */ , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(TAX_ITEM,1,3) NOT IN('101','102','111') THEN DECODE(CFTX_ADTX,0,CFTX_ASTX,CFTX_ASTX-CFTX_ADTX) ELSE 0 END AS CFTX /* 공동시설세 */ , NVL(CFTX_ADTX,0) AS CFTX_ADTX /* 공동시설세가산금 */ , NVL(DECODE(LETX_ADTX,0,LETX,LETX-LETX_ADTX),0) AS LETX /* 교육세 */ , NVL(LETX_ADTX,0) AS LETX_ADTX /* 교육세가산금 */ , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(TAX_ITEM,1,3) IN('101','102','111') THEN DECODE( ASTX_ADTX,0,CFTX_ASTX,CFTX_ASTX-ASTX_ADTX) ELSE 0 END AS ASTX /* 농특세 */ , NVL(ASTX_ADTX,0) AS ASTX_ADTX /* 농특세가산금 */ , NVL(CRE_DT,' ') AS TAX_DT /* 고지발생일 */ , NVL(DUE_DT,' ') AS DUE_DT /* 납기일 */ , NVL(SUBSTR(INSERT_DT,1,8),' ') AS INSERT_DT /* 입력시간 */ , NVL(TRIM(TAX_STD_DIS),'') AS TAX_STD_DIS /* 과세표준설명 */ , NVL(TRIM(TAX_STD_DIS2),'') AS TAX_STD_DIS2 /* 과세표준설명2 */ , NVL(SUM_B_AMT,0) AS SUM_B_AMT /* 납기내총금액 */ , NVL(SUM_F_AMT,0) AS SUM_F_AMT /* 납기후총금액 */ , NVL(GOJI_DIV,' ') AS GOJI_DIV /* 고지구분 */ , '2' AS TONG_DIV /* 통합구분(기본값:2) */ , NVL(CUD_OPT,' ') AS CUD_OPT /* 신규/변동구분 */ , NVL(TRIM(EPAY_NO),' ') AS EPAY_NO /* 전자납부번호 */ , SEQ AS SEQ /* 일련번호 */ , NVL(RCP_CNT,0) AS RCP_CNT /* 분납횟수 */ , NVL(DLQ_DIV,0) AS DLQ_DIV /* 체납구분 미납:1,체납2 */ , NVL(TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD),' ') AS EPAY_NO_OLD /* 구전자납부번호 */ , NVL(AUTO_TRNF_YN, 'N') AS AUTO_TRNF_YN /* 자동이체여부 */ , NVL(GIROSGG_COD,' ') AS GIRO_SGG /* 발행기관분류코드 */ , NVL(GIRO_NO,' ') AS GIRO_NO /* 지로번호 */ , NVL(TAX_NO,' ') AS TAX_NO /* 납세번호 */ , NVL(DUE_F_DT,' ') AS GGYM /* 납기후일자 */ , NVL(DUE_DF_OPT,' ') AS NOTICE_CLS /* 납기후수납여부 */ , CASE WHEN CUD_OPT IN ('3') THEN 'Y' ELSE DECODE(SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT, 0, 'Y', 'N') END AS DEL_YN /* 신규/변동/삭제 구분 */ , SIDO_COD||SGG_COD||CHK1||ACCT_COD||TAX_ITEM||TAX_YY||TAX_MM||TAX_DIV||ADONG_COD||TO_CHAR(TAX_SNO,'FM099999') ||CHK2||TO_CHAR(SUM_B_AMT,'FM09999999999')||TO_CHAR(SUM_F_AMT,'FM09999999999')||CHK3 ||TO_CHAR(MNTX,'FM09999999999')||TO_CHAR(CPTX,'FM0999999999')||TO_CHAR(CFTX_ASTX,'FM0999999999') ||TO_CHAR(LETX,'FM09999999999')||DUE_DT ||CHK4||FILLER||GOJI_DIV||CHK5 AS OCR_BD , NVL(DLQ_CHG_DIV, ' ') AS DLQ_CHG_DIV /* 체납변경구분코드 */ , NVL(CAR_NO, ' ') AS CAR_NO /* 자동차번호 */ , CEIL(ROWNUM / #PAGE_PER_CNT#) AS PAGE /* 페이지당 갯수 */ FROM ( SELECT TMP.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM SCON602 WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') /* 처리상태 */ AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') /* 신규/변동/삭제 */ AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') /* 미체납/체납 */ AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# /* 전송처리코드 */ AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV='3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 ORDER BY SEQ ASC ) TMP ORDER BY RNUM ) ) T1 WHERE T1.PAGE = #PAGE#

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / #PAGE_PER_CNT#) PAGE FROM SCON602 WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') /* 처리상태 */ AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') /* 신규/변동/삭제 */ AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') /* 미체납/체납 */ AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# /* 전송처리코드 */ AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV='3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SCON604 SET VIR_ACC = '' , VIR_COM = '' WHERE C_SLF_ORG = #SIDO_COD#||#SGG_COD# AND C_SSEMOK = #TAX_ITEM# AND YY_GWASE = #TAX_YY# AND MM_GWASE = #TAX_MM# AND V_GWASE = #TAX_DIV# AND C_DONG = #HACD# AND S_GWASE = #TAX_SNO#

UPDATE TX1102_TB SET DEL_YN = #DEL_YN# /* 삭제여부 */ , DEL_DT = CASE WHEN #DEL_YN# = 'Y' THEN SYSDATE ELSE NULL END /* 삭제일시 */ , LAST_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE SGG_COD = #SGG_COD# /* 구청코드 */ AND ACCT_COD = #ACCT_COD# /* 회계코드 */ AND TAX_ITEM = #TAX_ITEM# /* 과세목코드 */ AND TAX_YY = #TAX_YY# /* 부과년도 */ AND TAX_MM = #TAX_MM# /* 부과월 */ AND TAX_DIV = #TAX_DIV# /* 기분 */ AND HACD = #HACD# /* 행정동 */ AND TAX_SNO = #TAX_SNO# /* 과세번호 */ AND RCP_CNT = #RCP_CNT# /* 분납순번 */ AND SNTG IN ('0','9')
UPDATE SCON602 SET TRN_YN = '1' WHERE SEQ = #SEQ#
sqlMap.select: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / #PAGE_PER_CNT#) AS PAGE FROM SCON743 WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') /* 처리상태 */ AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') /* 신규/변동/삭제 */ AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') /* 미체납/체납 */ AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# /* 전송처리코드 */ AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV = '3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NVL(SIDO_COD,' ') AS SIDO_COD /* 시도코드(2) */ , NVL(TAX_ITEM,' ') AS TAX_ITEM /* 과목코드(3) */ , NVL(TAX_YY,' ') AS TAX_YY /* 과세년도(4) */ , NVL(SGG_COD,' ') AS SGG_COD /* 구청코드(3) */ , NVL(ADONG_COD,' ') AS HACD /* 과세동코드(3) */ , NVL(TAX_SNO,' ') AS TAX_SNO /* 과세번호(6) */ , NVL(TAX_DIV, ' ') AS TAX_DIV /* 과세구분(1) */ , NVL(TAX_MM, ' ') AS TAX_MM /* 과세월(2) */ , NVL(ACCT_COD, ' ') AS ACCT_COD /* 회계코드(2) */ , NVL(REPLACE(REG_NO,' ',''), ' ') AS REG_NO /* 실명번호(3) */ , NVL(REPLACE(REG_NO_WT,' ',''), ' ') AS REG_NO_WT /* 위탁자실명번호(3) */ , NVL(SUBSTR(REPLACE(REG_NM,'''',''),1,200), ' ') AS REG_NM /* 실명(200) */ , NVL(REPLACE(TAX_GDS,'''',' '), ' ') AS MLGN /* 과세대상(60) */ , NVL(POST, ' ') AS ZIP_CD /* 발송지우편번호 */ , NVL(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ADDRESS,'''',' '),CHR(13),''),CHR(10),''),' ') AS ADDRESS /* 주소 */ , NVL(TAX_STD, 0) AS TAX_STD /* 과세표준액 */ , NVL(DECODE(MNTX_ADTX,0,MNTX,MNTX-MNTX_ADTX),0) AS MNTX /* 본세 */ , NVL(MNTX_ADTX,0) AS MNTX_ADTX /* 본세가산금 */ , NVL(DECODE(CPTX_ADTX,0,CPTX,CPTX-CPTX_ADTX),0) AS CPTX /* 도시셰획세 */ , NVL(CPTX_ADTX,0) AS CPTX_ADTX /* 도시계획세가산금 */ , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(TAX_ITEM,1,3) NOT IN('101','102','111') THEN DECODE(CFTX_ADTX,0,CFTX_ASTX,CFTX_ASTX-CFTX_ADTX) ELSE 0 END AS CFTX /* 공동시설세 */ , NVL(CFTX_ADTX,0) AS CFTX_ADTX /* 공동시설세가산금 */ , NVL(DECODE(LETX_ADTX,0,LETX,LETX-LETX_ADTX),0) AS LETX /* 교육세 */ , NVL(LETX_ADTX,0) AS LETX_ADTX /* 교육세가산금 */ , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(TAX_ITEM,1,3) IN('101','102','111') THEN DECODE( ASTX_ADTX,0,CFTX_ASTX,CFTX_ASTX-ASTX_ADTX) ELSE 0 END AS ASTX /* 농특세 */ , NVL(ASTX_ADTX,0) AS ASTX_ADTX /* 농특세가산금 */ , NVL(CRE_DT,' ') AS TAX_DT /* 고지발생일 */ , NVL(DUE_DT,' ') AS DUE_DT /* 납기일 */ , NVL(SUBSTR(INSERT_DT,1,8),' ') AS INSERT_DT /* 입력시간 */ , NVL(TRIM(TAX_STD_DIS),'') AS TAX_STD_DIS /* 과세표준설명 */ , NVL(TRIM(TAX_STD_DIS2),'') AS TAX_STD_DIS2 /* 과세표준설명2 */ , NVL(SUM_B_AMT,0) AS SUM_B_AMT /* 납기내총금액 */ , NVL(SUM_F_AMT,0) AS SUM_F_AMT /* 납기후총금액 */ , NVL(GOJI_DIV,' ') AS GOJI_DIV /* 고지구분 */ , '2' AS TONG_DIV /* 고지구분 */ , NVL(CUD_OPT,' ') AS CUD_OPT /* 고지구분 */ , NVL(TRIM(EPAY_NO),' ') AS EPAY_NO /* 전자납부번호 */ , SEQ AS SEQ /* 일련번호 */ , NVL(RCP_CNT,0) AS RCP_CNT /* 분납횟수 */ , NVL(DLQ_DIV,'0') AS DLQ_DIV /* 체납구분 미납:1,체납2 */ , NVL(TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD),' ') AS EPAY_NO_OLD /* 구전자납부번호 */ , NVL(AUTO_TRNF_YN, 'N') AS AUTO_TRNF_YN /* 자동이체여부 */ , NVL(GIROSGG_COD,' ') AS GIRO_SGG /* 발행기관분류코드 */ , NVL(GIRO_NO,' ') AS GIRO_NO /* 지로번호 */ , NVL(TAX_NO,' ') AS TAX_NO /* 납세번호 */ , NVL(DUE_F_DT,' ') AS GGYM /* 납기후 */ , NVL(DUE_DF_OPT,' ') AS NOTICE_CLS /* 납기후 */ , CASE WHEN CUD_OPT IN ('3') THEN 'Y' ELSE DECODE(SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT, 0, 'Y', 'N') END AS DEL_YN /* 신규/변동/삭제 구분 */ , SIDO_COD||SGG_COD||CHK1||ACCT_COD||TAX_ITEM||TAX_YY||TAX_MM||TAX_DIV||ADONG_COD ||TO_CHAR(TAX_SNO,'FM099999')||CHK2||TO_CHAR(SUM_B_AMT,'FM09999999999') ||TO_CHAR(SUM_F_AMT,'FM09999999999')||CHK3||TO_CHAR(MNTX,'FM09999999999')||TO_CHAR(CPTX,'FM0999999999') ||TO_CHAR(CFTX_ASTX,'FM0999999999')||TO_CHAR(LETX,'FM09999999999')||DUE_DT ||CHK4||FILLER||GOJI_DIV||CHK5 AS OCR_BD , NVL(DLQ_CHG_DIV, ' ') AS DLQ_CHG_DIV /* 체납변경구분코드 */ , NVL(CAR_NO, ' ') AS CAR_NO /* 자동차번호 */ , CEIL(ROWNUM / #PAGE_PER_CNT#) AS PAGE /*페이지당 갯수 */ FROM ( SELECT TMP.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM SCON743 WHERE DEAL_STATE IN ('E', 'P') /* 처리상태 */ AND CUD_OPT IN ('1', '2', '3') /* 신규/변동/삭제 */ AND DLQ_DIV IN ('1', '2') /* 미체납/체납 */ AND TRN_YN = #TRN_YN# /* 전송처리코드 */ AND TRIM(REG_NO) IS NOT NULL AND NOT (TAX_DIV = '3' AND TRIM(EPAY_NO) <> TRIM(EPAY_NO_OLD) AND SUM_B_AMT+SUM_F_AMT > 0 ) AND MOD(SUM_B_AMT,10) = 0 AND MOD(SUM_F_AMT,10) = 0 ORDER BY SEQ ASC ) TMP ORDER BY RNUM ) ) T1 WHERE T1.PAGE = #PAGE#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TX1101_TB_DAMO ( /* 지방세부과 */ SGG_COD /* 구청코드 */ , ACCT_COD /* 회계코드 */ , TAX_ITEM /* 과세목 */ , TAX_YY /* 부과년도 */ , TAX_MM /* 부과월 */ , TAX_DIV /* 기분 */ , HACD /* 행정동 */ , TAX_SNO /* 과세번호 */ , JAKU /* 과표근거 */ , ABKU /* 압류구분 */ , NPJA /* 납세의무자 */ , SEC_REG_NO /* 주민법인번호 */ , SEC_REG_NO_WT /* 위탁자 주민법인번호 */ , REG_NM /* 성명 */ , MLGN /* 물건 */ , ZIP_CD /* 우편번호 */ , ADDRESS /* 주소 */ , TAX_STD /* 과세표준액 */ , ADD_CNT /* 가산횟수 */ , TAX_STD_DIS /* 부과근거 */ , TAX_STD_DIS2 /* 부과근거2 */ , CHG_CNT /* 수정횟수 */ , WDATE /* 자료전송일자 */ , GIRO_SGG /* 발행기관분류코드 */ , GIRO_NO /* 과세기관지로번호 */ , INPUT_ID /* 입력자 */ , CAR_NO /* 자동차번호 */ , WORK_DTM /* 작업일자 */ , REG_DTM /* 등록일자 */ , LAST_DTM ) VALUES ( #SGG_COD# /* 구청코드 */ , #ACCT_COD# /* 회계코드 */ , #TAX_ITEM# /* 과세목 */ , #TAX_YY# /* 부과년도 */ , #TAX_MM# /* 부과월 */ , #TAX_DIV# /* 기분 */ , #HACD# /* 행정동 */ , #TAX_SNO# /* 과세번호 */ , #JAKU# /* 과표근거 */ , #ABKU# /* 압류구분 */ , #NPJA# /* 납세의무자 */ , FC_DAMO(#REG_NO#) /* 주민법인번호 */ , FC_DAMO(#REG_NO_WT#) /* 위탁자 주민법인번호 */ , #REG_NM# /* 성명 */ , #MLGN# /* 물건 */ , #ZIP_CD# /* 우편번호 */ , #ADDRESS# /* 주소 */ , #TAX_STD# /* 과세표준액 */ , #ADD_CNT# /* 가산횟수 */ , #TAX_STD_DIS# /* 부과근거 */ , #TAX_STD_DIS2# /* 부과근거2 */ , #CHG_CNT# /* 수정횟수 */ , #WDATE# /* 자료전송일자 */ , #GIRO_SGG# /* 발행기관분류코드 */ , #GIRO_NO# /* 과세기관지로번호 */ , #INPUT_ID# /* 입력자 */ , #CAR_NO# /* 자동차번호 */ , SYSDATE /* 작업일자 */ , SYSDATE /* 등록일자 */ , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TX1101_TB_DAMO /* 지방세부과 */ SET JAKU = #JAKU# /* 과표근거 */ , ABKU = #ABKU# /* 압류구분 */ , NPJA = #NPJA# /* 납부의무자 */ , SEC_REG_NO = FC_DAMO(#REG_NO#) /* 주민번호 */ , SEC_REG_NO_WT = FC_DAMO(#REG_NO_WT#) /* 위탁자 주민번호 */ , REG_NM = #REG_NM# /* 성명 */ , MLGN = #MLGN# /* 물건 */ , ZIP_CD = #ZIP_CD# /* 우편번호 */ , ADDRESS = #ADDRESS# /* 주소 */ , TAX_STD = #TAX_STD# /* 과세표준액 */ , ADD_CNT = #ADD_CNT# /* 가산횟수 */ , TAX_STD_DIS = #TAX_STD_DIS# /* 부과근거 */ , TAX_STD_DIS2 = #TAX_STD_DIS2# /* 부과근거2 */ , CHG_CNT = #CHG_CNT# /* 수정횟수 */ , WDATE = #WDATE# /* 자료전송일자 */ , GIRO_SGG = #GIRO_SGG# /* 발행기관지로번호 */ , GIRO_NO = #GIRO_NO# /* 과세기관지로번호 */ , INPUT_ID = #INPUT_ID# /* 입력자 */ , CAR_NO = #CAR_NO# /* 자동차번호 */ , WORK_DTM = SYSDATE /* 작업일자 */ , LAST_DTM = SYSDATE /* 최종수정일자 */ WHERE SGG_COD = #SGG_COD# /* 구청코드 */ AND ACCT_COD = #ACCT_COD# /* 회계코드 */ AND TAX_ITEM = #TAX_ITEM# /* 세목코드 */ AND TAX_YY = #TAX_YY# /* 부과년도 */ AND TAX_MM = #TAX_MM# /* 부과월 */ AND TAX_DIV = #TAX_DIV# /* 과세구분 */ AND HACD = #HACD# /* 행정동 */ AND TAX_SNO = #TAX_SNO# /* 과세번호 */
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TX1102_TB ( SGG_COD , ACCT_COD , TAX_ITEM , TAX_YY , TAX_MM , TAX_DIV , HACD , TAX_SNO , RCP_CNT , DLQ_DIV , MNTX , MNTX_ADTX , CPTX , CPTX_ADTX , CFTX , CFTX_ADTX , LETX , LETX_ADTX , ASTX , ASTX_ADTX , TAX_DT , DUE_DT , SUM_B_AMT , SUM_F_AMT , GOJI_DIV , CUD_OPT , SNTG , EPAY_NO , TONG_DIV , EPAY_NO_OLD , AUTO_TRNF_YN , GGYM , DEADLINE_DT , TAX_NO , NOTICE_CLS , PROC_CLS , DEL_YN , SAYU_CD , DL_TAX_DT , SGG_TR_TG , VIR_ACC_NO , OCR_BD , DEL_DT , DLQ_CHG_DIV ) VALUES ( #SGG_COD# , #ACCT_COD# , #TAX_ITEM# , #TAX_YY# , #TAX_MM# , #TAX_DIV# , #HACD# , #TAX_SNO# , #RCP_CNT# , #DLQ_DIV# , #MNTX# , #MNTX_ADTX# , #CPTX# , #CPTX_ADTX# , #CFTX# , #CFTX_ADTX# , #LETX# , #LETX_ADTX# , #ASTX# , #ASTX_ADTX# , #TAX_DT# , #DUE_DT# , #SUM_B_AMT# , #SUM_F_AMT# , #GOJI_DIV# , #CUD_OPT# , #SNTG# , #EPAY_NO# , #TONG_DIV# , #EPAY_NO_OLD# , #AUTO_TRNF_YN# , #GGYM# , #DEADLINE_DT# , #TAX_NO# , #NOTICE_CLS# , #PROC_CLS# , #DEL_YN# , #SAYU_CD# , #DL_TAX_DT# , #SGG_TR_TG# , '' , FC_CHECK_OCR(#OCR_BD#) , CASE WHEN #DEL_YN# = 'Y' THEN SYSDATE ELSE NULL END , #DLQ_CHG_DIV# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TX1102_TB SET DLQ_DIV = #DLQ_DIV# /* 체납구분 */ , MNTX = #MNTX# /* 본세 */ , MNTX_ADTX = #MNTX_ADTX# /* 본세 가산금 */ , CPTX = #CPTX# /* 도시계획세 */ , CPTX_ADTX = #CPTX_ADTX# /* 도시계획세 가산금 */ , CFTX = #CFTX# /* 공동시설세 */ , CFTX_ADTX = #CFTX_ADTX# /* 공동시설세 가산금 */ , LETX = #LETX# /* 교육세 */ , LETX_ADTX = #LETX_ADTX# /* 교육세가산금 */ , ASTX = #ASTX# /* 농특세 */ , ASTX_ADTX = #ASTX_ADTX# /* 농특세 가산금 */ , TAX_DT = #TAX_DT# /* 부과일자 */ , DUE_DT = #DUE_DT# /* 납기일자 */ , SUM_B_AMT = #SUM_B_AMT# /* 납기내금액 */ , SUM_F_AMT = #SUM_F_AMT# /* 납기후금액 */ , GOJI_DIV = #GOJI_DIV# /* 고지구분 */ , CUD_OPT = #CUD_OPT# /* 변동구분 */ , SNTG = #SNTG# /* 수납구분 */ , EPAY_NO = #EPAY_NO# /* 전자납부번호 */ , TONG_DIV = #TONG_DIV# /* 통합구분코드 */ , EPAY_NO_OLD = #EPAY_NO_OLD# /* 구전자납부번호 */ , AUTO_TRNF_YN = #AUTO_TRNF_YN# /* 자동이체여부 */ , GGYM = #GGYM# /* 납기후일자 */ , DEADLINE_DT = #DEADLINE_DT# /* 납기후일자 */ , TAX_NO = #TAX_NO# /* 납부번호 */ , NOTICE_CLS = #NOTICE_CLS# /* 납기후수납가능여부 */ , PROC_CLS = DECODE(#DLQ_CHG_DIV#, '10', PROC_CLS, '1') /* 가상계좌채번구분 */ , DEL_YN = #DEL_YN# /* 삭제여부 */ , SAYU_CD = #SAYU_CD# /* 사유코드 */ , DL_TAX_DT = #DL_TAX_DT# /* 체납부과일자 */ , SGG_TR_TG = DECODE(#DLQ_CHG_DIV#, '10', SGG_TR_TG, DECODE(VIR_ACC_NO,'','0',SGG_TR_TG)) /* 구청전송구분 */ , OCR_BD = FC_CHECK_OCR(#OCR_BD#) , DEL_DT = CASE WHEN #DEL_YN#='Y' THEN SYSDATE ELSE NULL END /* 삭제일시 */ , DLQ_CHG_DIV = #DLQ_CHG_DIV# , LAST_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND SGG_COD = #SGG_COD# /* 구청코드 */ AND ACCT_COD = #ACCT_COD# /* 회계코드 */ AND TAX_ITEM = #TAX_ITEM# /* 과세목코드 */ AND TAX_YY = #TAX_YY# /* 부과년도 */ AND TAX_MM = #TAX_MM# /* 부과월 */ AND TAX_DIV = #TAX_DIV# /* 기분 */ AND HACD = #HACD# /* 행정동 */ AND TAX_SNO = #TAX_SNO# /* 과세번호 */ AND RCP_CNT = #RCP_CNT# /* 분납순번 */ AND SNTG IN ('0','9')
UPDATE SCON743 SET TRN_YN = '1' WHERE SEQ = #SEQ#
UPDATE ES5001_TB SET STATUS = '9' WHERE EPAY_NO = #EPAY_NO#
sqlMap.select: SELECT gb ,tax_no FROM ( SELECT '602' AS gb ,tax_no FROM scon602 UNION ALL SELECT '743' AS gb ,tax_no FROM scon743 ) WHERE sum_b_amt <> 0 AND tax_no IN ( SELECT substr(ocr_bd,1,31) FROM tx1201_tb WHERE pay_dt = SYSDATE AND bank_cd ='098' MINUS SELECT tax_no FROM tx1201_vw_rcp WHERE pay_dt = SYSDATE AND bank_cd = '098' )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE scon602 SET trn_yn='0' WHERE tax_no = #tax_no#
UPDATE scon743 SET trn_yn='0' WHERE tax_no = #tax_no#
